ValidationRule.description:
For Classic and Console Cases.
This validation rule will enforce that if user's manually associate a case to a parent case that the parent case does not have a parent case of its own. For the CS Console implementation Q3 2017
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Console_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName ="Equipment_Parts_and_Service", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Console_CS_Lightning"), NOT( ISBLANK(Parent.ParentId )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Parent case you chose already has its own parent. Please populate this field with the original Parent Case number.
